title: Solus - Eric Gill
content: Anyone know where I can take a look at Solus, the Eric Gill font withdrawn by Monotype in the sixties?
author: keith

comments.content:
Thanks Alessandro,   
   
Solus is very Gill, very beautiful. I can't understand why they withdrew it.
I agree. Why was this axed?
Hi Kris, I am writing to Agfa Monotype in UK, see if it can get resurrected - It would even make a really nice distressed font scanning Alessandro's jpg.
